class_notes:
(Same as ANT 385 900, MESAS 390 900, HLTH 385 900)
Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 18 - June 21, 2024.  Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Tibet's history, geography, and spiritual legacy produced a unique culture that only recently has come into contact with the West; these three facets will be explored for their impact on Tibetan culture.
instructors: Geshe Lobsang Tenzin Negi - Primary Instructor
